events.message: I ordered a smartphone last week and want to return it because it does not match the description on your website.
Ticket has been categorized under Refund as the customer wants to return the product.
Support agent Karen has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order return. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for return so I can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The phone’s battery life is much shorter than advertised, so I’d like to return it.
We can definitely help you with a full refund upon receiving the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for your quick response and for providing the return label. I will send the phone back by tomorrow.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account in 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey in a separate email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
